channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla Is Sued by Families Who Say Faulty Cybertruck Doors Led to Two Deaths
item.description: A college student was trapped in a burning Cybertruck because electronic doors made it difficult for her to get out or be rescued, a lawsuit claims.

item.title: ‘I don’t know why I need to go to college’: Ford CEO says his Gen Z son worked as a mechanic and wondered if the 4-year degree was still worth it
item.description: Jim Farley hosted a panel with Mike Rowe, who said, "nothing in the history of western civilization has gotten more expensive, more quickly" than coll...

item.title: After Trump Pulls Funding, Work Continues on N.Y. Area Transit Projects
item.description: Two of the largest infrastructure initiatives in the United States were still moving forward this week despite the battles over a government shutdown ...

item.title: Meet Dot: DoorDash’s new 5-foot, 350-pound robot delivery driver that can hit 20 mph
item.description: Dot’s creators are convinced it's ready to take on the world despite its innocent look.

item.title: Your office might be noticeably empty on Oct. 3 thanks to Taylor Swift’s new album release, study shows
item.description: More than one-third of U.S. workers (36%) identify as a Swiftie, a BambooHR study shows.

item.title: Gen Z, millennials, and Republicans drive trust in media to the lowest ever recorded, a shocking collapse of 40 percentage points since 1972
item.description: Trust in media has never been lower, Gallup says. A shocking 70% of U.S. adults have “not very much” confidence or “none at all” in what they see and ...

item.title: Veterans See Costs and Risks in Hegseth’s Military Rewind to 1990
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has identified real problems, veteran officers say, but by looking back 35 years for policy cues, he risks hurting, not...

item.title: ‘A Crazy Moment’: Shock and Terror Spreads in Manchester Synagogue’s Community
item.description: Many Orthodox Jews who live in the area reacted with horror to an attack that killed two people and seriously injured three on Yom Kippur, Judaism’s h...

item.title: Elon Musk’s big week, from spurring a Netflix cancelation wave to blowing out EV sales estimates; Tesla stock falls
item.description: Tesla stock closed Thursday down 4.5% to $439 amid skepticism the new number really signals a turnaround given all the anti-Musk backlash.

item.title: Why Can’t a Working-Class Kid Make Their Way Out of Ohio?
item.description: Silas’s future seemed bright except for at least one detail. He didn’t have a car.

item.title: ‘Appalled,’ ‘horrified,’ ‘sickening’: Leaders and residents condemn the Manchester attack.
Deadly Car Ramming and Stabbing at U.K. Synagogue Is Declared Terrorist Attack

item.title: 3 Killed in Antigovernment Protests in Morocco
item.description: Demonstrators, mostly younger people, vented anger against heavy spending on preparations for the 2030 soccer World Cup instead of on public services.
